line_2: "My sister no fond friend can shield,
To any perils he disdained to yield,

line_1: Her sanguine votaries here Ambition steel'd,
line_2: What slaughter once empurpled o'er this field!

line_1: There hard'ning by degrees, 'till double steel'd,
line_2: Take leave of nature's God, and God reveal'd,

line_1: Search where Ambition rag'd, with rigour steel'd;
line_2: And say, while Memory weeps the blood-stain'd field,

line_1: 'Twas she thy God-like Russell's bosom steel'd
line_2: Stern-smiling. She, with calm composure, held
